name: Complete Tree
description: This is the complete phylogenetic tree available in multiple formats. The JSON file includes other attributes such as colorcodes and accession numbers.

name: Superhaplo Pruned Tree
description: This is the radial Overview Tree as data. Only Superhaplogroups are shown, others are mainly omitted. Nodes are promoted to lower depths if their parents are not necessary to represent the tree, so depths are not accurate.

name: Full HG Signatures
description: List of the full HG-motifs for all Haplogroups.

name: Profiles
description: Accession Numbers and their attributes per Haplogroup as '.csv' files.
